Description:
Narrative what should be traced  for whom (Operation. Developer. Administrator) . and how developers use tracing {e.g. attributes. services. injection}
Acceptance Criteria: (presented as Scenarios)

Scenario 1: Request performance measurement
Given: The trace system is able to provide information for performance measuring
When: Prism receives a request
Then: Prism starts tracing this request process time till respond to client 
And: trace time stamp at critical process point
